H3.text: when did the log flume closed at alton towers. 2015

A4.text: Late in the 2015 season, the ride and the neighboring tavern closed and were removed in 2016 to make way for the Wicker Man roller coaster and the 'Welcome Inn' bar which shares the coaster's theme.
